charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MDMA(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the Custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 408 months. This term consists of 48 months on Count 1. Supervised Release for 5 years. This term consists of 3 years on Count 1, under the terms and conditions of the U.S. Probation Office and General Order 318 Special assessment of $800. Fine of $17,500. Defendant informed of right to appeal.

Defendant is committed to the Custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 408 months. This term consists of 48 months each on Counts 2 through 6. Supervised Release for 5 years. This term consists of 3 years on Counts 2 through 6, under the terms and conditions of the U.S. Probation Office and General Order 318 Special assessment of $800. Fine of $17,500. Defendant informed of right to appeal.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1); 18:2 POSSESION WITH INTNET TO DISTRIBUTE MDMA; AIDING AND ABETTING(5-6)

charges.charge_disposition: On Government's motion, all remaining counts ORDERED dismissed.

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(7s-8s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the Custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 408 months. This term consists of 60 months each on Count 7 and 300 months on Count 8. Supervised Release for 5 years. This term consists of 5 years on each of Counts 7 and 8, under the terms and conditions of the U.S. Probation Office and General Order 318 Special assessment of $800. Fine of $17,500. Defendant informed of right to appeal.
